title: 七级了，发个投票玩玩（今天似乎很多人手滑了）
author: 请无视此ID
txt_content:
本帖最后由 请无视此ID 于 2016-10-23 13:15 编辑 

七级了 感觉好开心

终于可以发投票了
终于可以去末地玩了

想问回帖奖励是不是改了，似乎好容易手滑


http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=643785

"I am the bone of my sword."
"Steel is my body and Fire is my blood."
"I have created over a thousand blades."

"Yet,those hands will never hold anything."
"So as I pray,Unlimited Blade Works."
